amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 14029 which authorizes $10 million per year over 3 years for the Secretary of Energy to enter into cooperative, cost-shared agreements with domestic uranium miners to develop improved uranium mining technologies, including those that have minimal environmental impacts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 108-69 strikes section 14029, eliminating the $10 million payment for three years to improve leaching uranium mining techniques.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Udall (NM) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 231 (Roll no. 138).
